Summary: 3 star like lights moving very high & very fast from east in triangle formation started to move around each other and move to the north
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my back yard around 3AM having a smoke. As I sat there I look at the night sky in an easterly direction.I noticed two airliners in the sky at that time, one in the northeast sky and the other in the southeast sky.At this time I saw what looked like three lights in a triangle formation across the sky from the east.Then the lights started to move around each other in a clockwise direction. At the same time the three lights started to move to the north very fast and very high out of my sight. This all took place in around 30 seconds.I was very excited about the whole thing.it covered the entire sky within my view in less than half a minute, thats got to be moving very fast.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Waterloo
There were no other sightings in Waterloo on or around April 4th 2006
